name: AmaranTime Arena
description:
AmaranTime Arena is an Early Access VR Arcade Shooter! This game pushes the player to use as much of their body and mind to last as long as they can against the robots!

Basic Instructions:

Grip Button - Grab objects (gun, teleport disk, sword, etc...)

Trigger Button - Fire gun (when holding the gun)

Shield - To bring up the shield, simply cross your arms.

Movement:

This game was built to experiment with many movement options, I think there is a lot of untapped potential waiting to be discovered. In this game, you can teleport, walk, and sprint

Teleport - There is a blue disk on your hip. Grab it and toss it, you will teleport to where it lands

Walk - Press and hold up on the joystick of either controller. You will slowly move in the direction of the controller.

Sprint - With the joystick on the controller held up, run in place to move fast in the direction of the controller.
